subject: Run integration tests on all five ServiceTitan workflows
description:
Test all five workflows via their webhook endpoints to verify end-to-end functionality:
- 6.10/7.5: Group Members webhook -> Settings API -> OCC output
- 7.1: Call Association with integration_context payload
- 7.2: Call Association without integration_context (fallback)
- 7.3: Job Reminder end-to-end
- 7.4: Review Request end-to-end
activeForm: Running integration tests on ServiceTitan workflows
